title: Empowering the Next Generation: The Launch of the Champions Network
description: On the 22nd, the STEEP Project proudly launched the Champions Network, an initiative designed to empower girls to become leaders in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM). The launch was a moment, filled with enthusiasm and a shared...

title: A Day of Inspiration and Discovery: STEM Career Fair at Kokebe Tsibah High School
description: On Saturday, March 29, 2025, Kokebe Tsibah High School in Addis Ababa buzzed with excitement as we hosted a transformative STEM career fair under the STEEP (STEM Education for Empowerment Project) initiative. This event, meticulously planned and executed, brought together high...

title: Celebrating International Women's Day: Inspiring Inclusion
description: On March 8th, HaHuJobs, in collaboration with the U.S. Embassy in Addis Ababa, hosted a vibrant celebration for International Women's Day 2025, embracing this year's theme: 'Inspire Inclusion' for women and girls.
